text: Pushyamitra Sunga was the co-founder and ruler of the Sunga dynasty in 180 BC. Before that, he was the general of Mauryan emperor Brihadratha Maurya. He has survived by his wife Devamala and daughter Agnimitra. He ruled until his death in 149 BCE. Category:149 BC deaths Category:Indian monarchs Category:Shunga Empire
title: Pushyamitra Sunga
